alert.note: Alert for Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 1:20PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Rock Island and central Scott Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 120 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rock Island, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Davenport and Eldridge. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 286 and 298. Interstate 280 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
